channel.title: Clicking buttons
channel.description: i know how to find the action button id, but where do i put it to make it do something when clicked? thanks - Dez

item.title: Clicking buttons
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“dezman, post:4, topic:293136”][quote author=Tonic link=topic=387332.msg2900855#msg2900855 date=1249503816]
search for this in clickingmost.java

client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a];

then add this after it System.out.println("Clicked button: " + c.actionButtonId + "");

So it will look like this client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[a]; System.out.println("Clicked button: " + c.actionButtonId + "");

Then in the run.bat it shows the id of the button
[/quote]

I know how to get the action button…, but how do i add to the server how it know what its clicked?[/quote]
inclicking most so say for example you wanna close a interface do this.

case 53186:
c.closeInterface();
break;

Then for the case just add the action button ID, is this what your talking about?

Read full topic
